title: Self-Efficacy Enhancement and Barrier Overcoming Strategies for Instructional Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and possession of expertise in social studies
context.additional_context: Developing Instructional Technology Integration Competencies in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more personal barriers encountered during instructional technology adoption
Learners can apply five practice-based strategies for enhancing self-efficacy to actual educational scenarios
Learners can develop a PBL instructional design framework utilizing mobile devices (smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
